sense.def:
Time
je tisto, kar merimo v urah, dnevih in letih.

seg.quote: ...a period of time.
Time passed, and finally he fell asleep again.

sense.def:
Time
je konkretna časovna točka, ki jo lahko izrazimo z urami in minutami ter razberemo na urah.

seg.quote: What's the time?
Ask the times of planes from Rome to Vienna.

sense.def:
Izraz
time
uporabljamo tudi za obdobje, ko nekdo nekaj dela.

seg.quote: How do you find time to write these books?
She spends most of her time sunbathing.
It would take a long time to discuss.

sense.def:
Izraz
time
pomeni tudi posamezni trenutek ali obdobje, za katerega opisujemo, kaj se takrat dogaja.

seg.quote: He blushed each time she spoke to him.
Ask for something different next time.
There were times when I didn't know what to do.

sense.def:
Izraz
time
za številom pove, kolikokrat se nekaj zgodi.

seg.quote: Ray and I play squash three times a week.
The telephone rang a second time.

gramGrp.pos:
COUNT N
or
UNCOUNT N
with
SUPP

sense.def:
Time
je tudi določeno obdobje v človekovem življenju ali zgodovini.

seg.quote: ...during my time in Toronto.
...the time of the Roman Empire.
...one of the great unsolved mysteries of our time.
...the history of modern times.

sense.def:
Kar se dogaja
for a time
, se dogaja precej dolgo časa.

seg.quote: It's nice to be in London for a time.
It became clear after a time that he was very ill.

sense.def:
Izraz
time
dodamo za števili, da povemo, kolikokrat večja, manjša, boljša ali slabša je neka stvar v primerjavi s kakšno drugo.

seg.quote: It would cost me ten times as much.
It has become three times as difficult as it used to be.

sense.def:
V aritmetiki izraz
times
povezuje števila ali količine, ki jih medsebojno množimo.

seg.quote: 5 times 50—that's 250.

sense.def:
To time something for a particular time
pomeni načrtovati, da se bo nekaj zgodilo v določenem trenutku.

seg.quote: Their disruption was timed for 9.20.

sense.def:
To time an action or activity
pomeni z uro ugotavljati, koliko časa traja neko dejanje ali dejavnost.

seg.quote: This was repeated at intervals which he timed on his watch.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekdo
in time for something
, za tisto ni prepozen.

To be in good time
pomeni priti ali nekaj narediti prej, kot je treba.

Kadar nekdo pride
on time
, pride takrat, ko je prav.

Kar je obstajalo
at one time
, je obstajalo v preteklosti.

Kar se dogaja
at times
, je dogaja včasih.

Izraz
at a time
uporabimo, kadar želimo povedati, koliko stvari ali oseb je udeleženih pri nečem v določenem trenutku.

seg.quote: He used to abandon his work for many months at a time.
There was only room for one person at a time.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
at the same time
uvedemo trditev, ki je v nasprotju s prejšnjo.

seg.quote: It made us cautious but at the same time it made us willing to take a risk.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
it is about time that something was done
izražamo odločno prepričanje, da bi bilo nekaj treba storiti.

seg.quote: It's about time that Parliament concentrated on unemployment.

sense.def:
Kdor je
ahead of his time
, pride na neko misel prej, preden tudi drugi začnejo razmišljati na podoben način.

Kdor je
behind the times
, je starokopiten.

Kadar nekaj naredimo
for the time being
, tisto naredimo za nekaj časa, dokler ni mogoče zagotoviti nečesa drugega.

seg.quote: For the time being, we ought to stay with him.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj naredimo
from time to time
, tisto naredimo občasno.

Če se bo nekaj zgodilo
in time
, se bo navsezadnje le zgodilo.

Če se bo nekaj zgodilo
in a week's time
ali
in a month's time
, se bo zgodilo čez en teden ali en mesec.

cit.quote: čez en teden; čez en mesec

sense.def:
Kadar govorimo o tem, kako dobro ura
keeps time
, s tem označujemo, kako točno kaže čas.

seg.quote: This has kept perfect time since I got it back.

sense.def:
To have no time for someone or something
pomeni, da nam nekdo ali nekaj ni všeč ali da tistega ne odobravamo.

To make good time on a journey
pomeni priti na cilj potovanja prej, kot smo pričakovali.

Kadar nekaj počnemo
to pass the time
, tisto delamo zato, ker nam je dolgčas ali ker nekaj čakamo, ne pa zato, ker bi tisto res želeli početi.

Kadar nekaj
takes time
, traja precej časa, preden se konča.

To take one's time doing something
pomeni nekaj delati počasi.

Kadar se nekaj dogaja
time after time
ali
time and again
, se dogaja pogosto.

Pregovor
time is worth ten thousand words
pomeni, da je koristneje ljudem posvetiti čas in ponuditi praktično pomoč, kot jim samo z besedami izražati razumevanje in podporo.

cit.quote: pomoč je treba izkazovati z dejanjem, ne le z besedami
